verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came also unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
Thou shalt not <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H802>wife<s%>, neither shalt thou have <S%H1121>sons<s%> or <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>sons<s%> and concerning the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> that are <S%H3205>born<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and concerning their <S%H517>mothers<s%> that <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H1>them<s%>, and concerning their fathers that <S%H3209>begat<s%> them in this <S%H776>land<s%>:

They shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8463>grievous<s%> <S%H4463>deaths<s%>: they shall not be <S%H5594>lamented<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H6912>buried<s%>; they shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>; and they shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and by <S%H7458>famine<s%>; and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and for the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H935>Enter<s%> not into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4798>mourning<s%>, neither <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5594>lament<s%>, neither <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H622>them<s%>; for I have taken away my <S%H7965>peace<s%> from this <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%>.

Both <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>; they shall not be <S%H6912>buried<s%>, neither shall men <S%H5594>lament<s%> for <S%H1413>them<s%>, nor cut <S%H7139>themselves<s%>, nor make themselves bald for them;

neither shall men <S%H6536>break<s%> bread for them in <S%H60>mourning<s%>, to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> them for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>; neither shall men give them the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8575>consolation<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> for their <S%H1>father<s%> or for their <S%H517>mother<s%>.
And thou shalt not <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> with <S%H398>them<s%>, to eat and to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H7673>Behold<s%>, I will cause to cease out of this <S%H4725>place<s%>, before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and in your <S%H3117>days<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H5046>pass<s%>, when thou shalt show this <S%H5971>people<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, Wherefore hath Jehovah <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H5771>us<s%>? or what is our iniquity? or what is our <S%H2403>sin<s%> that we have <S%H2398>committed<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1>them<s%>, Because your fathers have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and have <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and have worshipped <S%H5800>them<s%>, and have forsaken <S%H8104>me<s%>, and have not kept my <S%H8451>law<s%>;

and ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> more than your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; <S%H2009>for<s%>, behold, ye <S%H1980>walk<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, so that ye hearken not unto <S%H8085>me<s%>:

therefore will I <S%H2904>cast<s%> you forth out of this <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> that ye have not <S%H3045>known<s%>, neither ye nor your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and there shall ye <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>; for I will <S%H5414>show<s%> you no <S%H2594>favor<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that it shall no more be <S%H559>said<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, that brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

but <S%H3068><s%>, As Jehovah <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, that brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and from all the <S%H776>countries<s%> whither he had <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>. And I will bring them again into their <S%H127>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will send for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1771>fishers<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and they shall <S%H1770>fish<s%> them <S%H310>up<s%>; and afterward I will <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6719>hunters<s%>, and they shall <S%H6679>hunt<s%> them from every <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and from every <S%H1389>hill<s%>, and out of the <S%H5357>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rocks<s%>.

For mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are upon all their <S%H1870>ways<s%>; they are not <S%H5641>hid<s%> from my <S%H6440>face<s%>, neither is their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H6845>concealed<s%> <S%H5048>from<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H7223>first<s%> I will <S%H7999>recompense<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%>, because they have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H4390>things<s%>, and have filled mine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, my <S%H5797>strength<s%>, and my <S%H5797>stronghold<s%>, and my <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction<s%>, unto thee shall the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> nought but <S%H8267>lies<s%>, even <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and things wherein there is no <S%H3276>profit<s%>.
Shall a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> unto himself <S%H430>gods<s%>, which yet are no <S%H430>gods<s%>?

Therefore <S%H3045><s%>, behold, I will cause them to know, this <S%H6471>once<s%> will I cause them to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> and my <S%H1369>might<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
